name: Doraemon Jump: Dora Cake Adventure
description:
Doraemon Jump : Dora Cake Adventure is a Simple One Tap game.

Tap on the screen Anywhere and Jump on the Moving Doracakes.

Game Modes:

Infinite Mode and Episode Mode.

GamePlay;

Collect Maximum number of Doracakes , Reach as high as Possible, Use Bamboocopter to Fly over Doracakes.

Features:

Daily Rewards 

Shop

Achievements

Two Game Modes

One Tap game

Infinite/Endless Game
